_littleBlindTextWarning: FlexPrint combines years of printing expertise with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results. From custom packaging to promotional materials, we're committed to bringing your vision to life with precision and quality.
_featuringParagraph1: FlexPrint is a leading company in the printing industry, dedicated to providing innovative and high-quality solutions for all your printing needs.
_featuringParagraph2: With extensive industry experience and a team of professionals, we offer customized and efficient services, ensuring that each project meets the highest standards of quality and on-time delivery.
_featuringParagraph3: We produce cardboard packaging, printed advertising materials, and periodicals of any complexity.
_featuringTeam1: We receive the task and provide the solution
_featuringBox1: We produce high-quality boxes from binding cardboard
_featuringAtmosphere1: A cheerful and positive working atmosphere
_featuringShipping2: Delivery of any products within the municipality of Chișinău
_testimonialText1: FlexPrint exceeded our expectations with their custom printed boxes! The quality is unmatched, and the design options are endless. Fast delivery and exceptional customer service make them our go-to choice for packaging. Highly recommend!
_testimonialText2: FlexPrint has transformed our packaging experience! Their high-quality printed boxes are durable and visually appealing. The team is professional, fast, and attentive to detail. We’re consistently impressed with their excellent service and reliable turnaround times. Highly recommend
_testimonialText3: We’ve been working with FlexPrint for years, and they never disappoint. Their printed boxes are perfect every time, and their attention to detail is second to none. Reliable, fast, and top-notch service!
_testimonialText4: We trust FlexPrint for all our printing needs. Their printed boxes are always of the highest quality, and the team is incredibly responsive. Whether for small or large orders, they never fail to deliver excellence.
_testimonialText5: This company is a game-changer for our business! The custom packaging they provide is exactly what we need, and it’s always delivered on time. Their customer service is outstanding, and we couldn’t be happier with their work
_testimonialText6: We love working with FlexPrint! Their printed boxes give our products a professional edge, and the print quality is always flawless. The team is reliable and always on time, making them the best choice for our business.
_testimonialText7: FlexPrint’s attention to detail is unmatched! The printed boxes they create for us are always of the highest quality. They consistently deliver on time and with exceptional service. We won’t work with anyone else!
_testimonialText8: FlexPrint has provided us with top-quality packaging for years. Their printed boxes are consistent in quality and design, and they always meet our deadlines. Their customer service team goes above and beyond, making every order a smooth experience.
_testimonialText9: Working with FlexPrint has been an absolute pleasure. Their printed boxes are sturdy and beautifully designed, and their team is incredibly easy to work with. Always quick, reliable, and professional. A top-tier printing company!
_question1: What does the abbreviation 'CMYK' stand for?
_question2: What is the difference with a 'proprietary' form?
_question3: Which type of finishing makes the image more saturated?
_question4: Which type of binding is typically used for products with paper density over 200 g/m²: folding or creasing?
_question5: What is the minimum time in which you can print an order?
_question6: What determines the cost of producing a brochure?
_question7: Do you have designers who can design the pages of a catalog?
_answer2: Printing without changing the form (front and back on the same plate)
_answer3: Glossy lamination or glossy UV coating
_answer5: It depends on the complexity of the order, technical parameters, the quantity you want, as well as the workload of the printing house at the time the order is received. The average offset printing time is 3–5 business days.
_answer6: The price depends on color complexity, paper density, and quantity. The more copies, the lower the cost per unit of finished product.
_answer7: Yes, FlexPrint offers advertising and printing design services provided the printing and production are done in our printing house.
